page.title: 02 Transport
page.content:
A bus service runs to and from Inverness every half hour .The service bus goes through Kirkhill and calls at Inchmore on its way.It lets 18 children of at the school.
Lentran station has closed down for sometime but the signal box is still in use. Trains pass every hour going South to Inverness,North to Wick and West to Kyle. Sometimes fancy Royal trains pass through as well.The station used to be a request stop but now the trains do not stop.
Of all the children that attend { {Inchmore School},18 travel by bus,7 c ycle,3 walk and 22 come by car.
Most children own bikes.Most people in the area own their own car.
